metadata.title: CVE-2019-3871 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server before 4.0.7 andbefore 4.1.7. An insufficient validation of data coming from the user whenbuilding a HTTP request from a DNS query in the HTTP Connector of theRemote backend, allowing a remote user to cause a denial of service bymaking the server connect to an invalid endpoint, or possibly informationdisclosure by making the server connect to an internal endpoint and somehowextracting meaningful information about the response

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
